StatDef.label: CR_TEST aiming efficiency
StatDef.description:
How efficient the weapon is at leading and range-finding. This is multiplied against the aiming accuracy of the shooter to calculate the amount of range and lead error.

The final modifier is calculated via this formula:
(1.5 - aiming accuracy) / aiming efficiency

Lead error is calculated by multiplying this factor against total lead distance in cells. Range error is calculated by multiplying it against the total distance to the target divided by 4.

StatDef.label: CR_TEST spread
StatDef.description: Inherent projectile spread. This represents the inherent inaccuracy of the gun and causes random conical deviation that is not influenced by skill.

StatDef.label: CR_TEST weapon sway
StatDef.description:
How difficult the gun is to keep steady. 

The total sway is calculated as:
(4.5 - shooting accuracy) * weapon sway factor

Aiming accuracy influences the sway reduction during aimed shots. For example, at 75% aiming accuracy sway will be reduced to 25%.

StatDef.Name: CR_TEST_WeightStat
StatDef.label: CR_TEST weight
StatDef.description: The weight of an object when carried in a bag or pocket.

StatDef.Name: CR_TEST_BulkStat
StatDef.label: CR_TEST bulk
StatDef.description: The amount of inventory space an item takes up when carried in bag or pocket.
